name.japanese: レベル5.5 (ニューカマーランド)
name.romanized: Reberu Go ten Go (Nyū Kamā Rando)

description: A secret hidden level between Level 5 and Level 6 of Impel Down, unknown to the prison guards and warden. Created over 100 years ago by a prisoner with digging abilities, it serves as a sanctuary for escaped prisoners, particularly the okama/newkama community. The level features food, drink, entertainment, and a vibrant community that monitors the prison through stolen transponder snails and newspapers.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Level 5.5 - New Kama Land
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Bentham awaken in the hidden paradise of New Kama Land, a secret level filled with okama celebrating, completely unknown to Impel Down's guards.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the existence of a secret level in Impel Down that has existed for over 100 years, providing a crucial base for the eventual prison break.

keyEvents.title: Emporio Ivankov's Grand Entrance
keyEvents.description: Emporio Ivankov appears on stage in New Kama Land to welcome Bentham and reveal himself as the ruler of this hidden paradise.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Ivankov as the leader of this secret community within Impel Down.

statusHistory.reason: Secret level actively functioning as a hidden sanctuary within Impel Down

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル5 (極寒地獄)

description: The fifth level of Impel Down prison, known as Freezing Hell. A massive frozen wasteland where temperatures are far below freezing, causing prisoners to suffer from severe frostbite and hypothermia. The food is frozen solid and barely edible. This level houses criminals with bounties of 100,000,000 Berries and over. Packs of Army Wolves roam the level, hunting prisoners.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 2 Breaks Luffy Out of His Cell
keyEvents.description: Bentham breaks Luffy out of his cell on Level 5 and carries him across the frozen wasteland searching for Emporio Ivankov.
keyEvents.significance: Sets in motion the search for a cure to Luffy's poisoning.

keyEvents.title: Army Wolves Attack Luffy and Mr. 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Bentham are attacked by a pack of Army Wolves while crossing the frozen terrain of Level 5.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the desperate situation that triggers Luffy's unconscious use of Haki.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Unconscious Haki Display
keyEvents.description: Luffy unleashes Conqueror's Haki that knocks out all the attacking Army Wolves on Level 5.
keyEvents.significance: Important early display of Luffy's latent Conqueror's Haki ability.

statusHistory.reason: Level 5 continues to function as part of Impel Down prison
